sentence.Network_en: Superstitiously he refused to travel on Friday the 13 th.
sentence.Network_cn: 他很迷信,拒绝在一个是星期五的13号旅行.

sentence.Network_en: Simon superstitiously made the sign of the Tree as he looked around.
sentence.Network_cn: Simon打量四周的时候,迷信地画了一个树的符号.

some superstitious practices die hard in the countryside ., 在乡下 , 一些迷信做法很难根治.

auth_sentence.content: But how long we will superstitiously follow the old ideas that has failed us repeatedly for about a century?

auth_sentence.content: Some take it to extreme levels and superstitiously refuse to whatever is not in the text books.
